extendedInfo.description: The original and best version of Klondike Solitaire 3D, also called Patience! It features amazing graphics, as you can choose your own images!  Game solutions are available if you get stuck!  Move the cards easily with drag and drop, or point and click.  It features full undo and redo history with the back and forwards buttons, you can even replay the game you just won.  Keeps normal or Vegas scoring, or no score at all if desired.  The game animates from the shuffle through to the play and a mesmerising winning sequence where you can repeatedly blow up the cards!  Lots of graphic options like animation speed, motion blur, shadows, colored highlights and choice of backgrounds, decks and deck backings (with more on their way).  Other customizations are sound, auto play, left or right hand dealing and the ordering of the Ace bases.Let me earn your 5 stars.  For whatever reason this is not a 5 star game for you, tell me and I will try to make it so.  I respond to all emails.Developed by Jonathan Barton.

reviews.title: Crashes my Samsung Galaxy tablet :(
reviews.comment: Wish I could get my money back because this app crashes my tablet every time I try to play it.  :( Ross
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Removed
reviews.comment: Ever since I reloaded this app to a different phone, it would reset everything back to zero and make me start from scratch each time I played. Had to remove it. Would not recommend it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Improved
reviews.comment: Faster, less repeat deals, lots of fun time. Just updated today and I have  several hours on it already. If your not hooked on it like I am, you won\'rt notice any repeats. Thanks Jonathon for the upgrade.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Top Developer Top Game
reviews.comment: Brilliant game with a Top developer, i asked for a brightness slider developer said he would look into creating 1, i woke up next day and there was a new update with a brightness slider :) also worked with me to help solve a graphics problem i had with the game on my Galaxy Note (which eventually turned out to be my fault lol i had a setting enabled on a custom rom and it screwed up the game) so heads up check compatability mode in the spare parts app before you play this. and it will display fine. life storys over, Buy this game support the dev and Enjoy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome game!
reviews.comment: I play this game all the time.  Nice interface. Juss wish it would be kinder in dealing more winning hands. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent game. Received update within a day of buying through Android Market. App doesn\'t affect your privacy.

reviews.comment: I really enjoy this game. Never any issues.

reviews.title: Pretty good klondike game.
reviews.comment: Game runs smoothly. Graphics are fine. I hope that you put out more card games like bridge, spite & malice, gaps, accordian etc. Good job.

reviews.title: Free version is so good I bought it!
reviews.comment: This game is my new way to waste my life away! :-)
